summary: Visual Papyrus Reference. A modders resource.
descriptionHtml:
Thought Id warn this document is in need of some love. Its missing all the new functions from bethesda updates and I still havent added in skse functions. Still a solid reference just keep in mind its missing a few of the newer functions.

Visual Papyrus Reference. Was test driving my 30 day trial of Microsoft Visio and this happened.
I did this to get more exposure on Papyrus and learn Visio. I like how it turned out so Im gonna share it. 

-Now fully hyperlinked to the Creation Kit Wiki. 
-The main file is in .pdf format but I will upload other format types on request.

For best viewing use Adobe Reader http://get.adobe.com/reader/
Tips 
-Right click and select \"Hand Tool\" to drag your view around the document. Much better than using scroll bars.
-Best viewed between 75% and 100%
-Click around! Almost everything is hyperlinked to a source.

Please help me spot errors or suggest things to add. Report in the file comments thread.


-File Permissions-
Free to use, modify, and redistribute. 

Changelog
------------------------------------------------------------
===Version 5== (Current unreleased WIP)
-Adding SKSE functions
-Expanding time conversion tables to include day/month

==Version 4==
-Added property types table
-Added game hour conversion table
-Added condition function links
-Removed loose second page
-Fixed base script ReferenceAlias hyperlinked to LocationAlias script. 
-Reordered ObjectReference functions to TopDown>LeftRight

==Version 3==
-Added actor functions
-Added misc cheatsheets and references

==Version 2==
-Fully hyperlinked to creationkit.com
-Viso files included in download 

==Version 1==
-release
------------------------------------------------------------

If you liked this endorse it.
Post in the comments section if you think a similar cheatsheet for the Creation Kit would be cool.
author: Scrivener07
